item.description:
Yep that's right another invite incubators.

Come see some of your fellow incubators, Robin, Lisa, Ben, Jason, and Sandy perform this Sunday with their troupe Lost Marbles at ImprovBoston in Central Square. All the details below and be sure to read that last paragraph, you all get to come up on stage and have an audience with us at the end of the night!!! Rock on!

Any questions? Shoot me an email.

Great news!!! Lost Marbles found @ ImprovBoston this Sunday!!

Hey everybody!!

The whole Lost Marbles gang invites you to come on down to Sgt. Culpepper's Comedy Jamboree at ImprovBoston this Sunday, September 7th from 7pm -9pm to see some quit wit as we sling our improv bit right at ya.

We'll be firing off some great short form improv games in the vein of "Who's Line is It Anyway," that will surely set your cheeks ablaze. And we'll be coming to you the audience for the bullets, that is the suggestions to inspire us throughout our part of the show.

And on top of that as an optional part of the evening, if you'd like to take a crack at dispensing laughter, all of you will be invited on stage at the end of the night to take part in some simple improv games. No experience required!

Tickets are $10 / $7 for students and seniors

I hope to see some of you there kicking back and maybe even some of you dancing with us on stage in the crosshairs.
item.how_to_find_us: The announcers will say "Let's bring out Lost Marbles!" & we will magical appear
item.name: Come check out your organizers perform at ImprovBoston this Sunday!!!!
